mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart VALUES( cart_no_seq.nextval, #{gno}, #{id}, #{account}, 0, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT ct.no,gno,account,ok,TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday, goods_poster,goods_name,goods_price FROM cart ct, goods_all ga WHERE ct.id=#{id} AND ct.gno=ga.no ORDER BY ct.no DESC
